skills.intro: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience of working on different projects using different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies.

project1.about_text: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

project2.about_text: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
